Package store

Interface ShoppingBasket

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShoppingBasketImpl
    public interface ShoppingBasket

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void addItem​(Product product, int count)
      Add a product to this ShoppingBasket.
      void clear()
      Empties the ShoppingBasket

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        void addItem​(Product product,
             int count)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Add a product to this ShoppingBasket. Will combine and sum duplicate item counts if encountered.
        Parameters:
        product - - The product to add. May not be null.
        count - - The number of units of the product to add. Must be 1 or more.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if any of the parameter preconditions are breached.

      • removeItem

        boolean removeItem​(Product product,
                   int count)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes a product from this ShoppingBasket if and only if the given count or more was contained in the ShoppingBasket. If this brings the total count of that product to 0 the product entry is removed entirely.
        Parameters:
        product - - The product to remove. May not be null.
        count - - The number of units of the product to remove. Must be 1 or more.
        Returns:
        True if the given count of more of the given product were contained in the ShoppingBasket and thus removed. Otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if any of the parameter preconditions were breached.

      • getItems

        java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<Product,​java.lang.Integer>> getItems()
        Retrieves a list of each Product and count of units currently contained by this ShoppingBasket.
        Returns:
        The list of Products and count of units by Pair. Minimum count per product is 1.

      • getValue

        java.lang.Double getValue()
        Sums the prices of each unit of each product in this ShoppingBasket
        Returns:
        The total price of the ShoppingBasket contents.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Empties the ShoppingBasket
